timeline.message: Allow returning narrower types as readonly with interop
Resolve conflicts and Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/ballerina-lang/ballerina into fix-readonly-interop

timeline.bodyText: Can this be a constant? Do we have to do this for each and every time?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: Made this a final variable, initialized in the constructor (since we need the symbol table to retrieve the members).
replies.author: MaryamZi

timeline.message: Move defined readonly type array creation to the constructor

timeline.bodyText: then, can this be moved to symbolTable?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText:
We don't need this collection of types anywhere else since the read-only analysis is generally based on a flag + helper methods in Types.java. But for the method resolver we need these specifically for an initial isValidReturnBType check.
Shall we leave this here since it may not make sense in other contexts?
replies.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: this method does not do anything related to readOnly right?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText:
This is the external implementation directly mapped to a Ballerina function that accepts and returns readonly typed values.

  
    
      ballerina-lang/tests/jballerina-unit-test/src/test/resources/test-src/javainterop/ballerina_types_as_interop_types.bal
    
    
         Line 520
      in
      0f66dae
    
    
    
    

        
          
           function acceptAndReturnReadOnly(readonly value) returns readonly = @java:Method {
replies.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: can we say why these two types are skipped here ?
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText:
I think the comment at L744 covers this already? Or should we still update this?
Btw the logic here is similar to other generateCheckCastJToBXxxType methods here.
replies.author: MaryamZi

timeline.bodyText: Can't we combine the return true if statements using || ? and move all checks or individual checks to a different method if it makes sense
timeline.author: riyafa
